events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their car colliding with a stationary pole at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure prompt and effective communication with the customer.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim was received and is now under review.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and proof of insurance coverage.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
Investigation team began verifying the details of the collision and assessing damage extent to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded that the accident was caused by slippery road conditions and no third-party fault was found.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs and rental vehicle reimbursement was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the quick processing and clarity of the settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved, confirming the agreed settlement amount will be disbursed shortly.
The payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after the customer confirmed receipt of funds and successful vehicle repairs.
